name: OpsTheatre
body:
### Welcome to OpsTheatre.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

```
$ git clone --recursive https://github.com/olindata/ops-theatre.git ops-theatre
$ cd ops-theatre
```

### Authors and Contributors
@rajkissu and @walterheck as well as the rest of the team @olindata

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with OpsTheatre? Check out the documentation at http://opstheatre.com or contact support@olindata.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
